name: globexdesigns.brackets-jscs
title: JSCS
description: Adds JSCS support to Brackets. JSCS is a code style checker. JSCS can check cases, which are not implemeted in JSHint, but it does not duplicate JSHint functionality, so you should use JSCS and JSHint together.
author: Evgueni Naverniouk <evgueni@globexdesigns.com> (http://www.globexdesigns.com/)
